 2012-04992012-04-05,  ,  ,  ,  CH
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of RONALD CALDERONI of Boucherville, Quebec, as a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum of Nature to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, in the place of Melody J. McLeod.
AttachmentsAttachment
